======================== MSP to MetFrag parameter ========================
----------- Description -----------
| Read spectra from MSP file and create MetFrag parameter file.
----------- Input files -----------
+------------------------------+------------+ | File | Format | +==============================+============+ | 1) MSP file(s) | MSP | +------------------------------+------------+
---------- Parameters ----------
XCMS-Set file | A rdata file with XCMS-Set objects that were grouped by **xcms-collect-peaks** |
------------ Output files ------------
xcmssplit_input_1.rdata | (Multiple) rdata file(s) containing one XCMS-Set object each |
